hero_page_subtitle: Find out if a news is really true or if it is just a fake news. Also contribute with the app filtering news that you know about
create_account_motivation: Create your account to use the app
forgot_text: Insert your email to redefine your password.
discriptionPage1Onboarding: Use our app to find out whether a news article is truthful or not.
discriptionPage2Onboarding: Through the use of our homebrew AI, we can try to predict the truthfulness of a news article written in portuguese.
discriptionPage3Onboarding: All that you have to do now is Sign in and test your news.
